metadata.Paper Title: Polyglot-NER: Massive Multilingual Named Entity Recognition
metadata.Abstract: This paper introduces Polyglot-NER, a massive multilingual named entity recognition dataset. We provide annotations in 159 languages, covering a broad spectrum of linguistic diversity. Polyglot-NER is designed to advance research in cross-lingual entity extraction, offering a valuable resource for developing and evaluating NER systems across multiple languages. The dataset is made publicly available to promote further research in this area.
